channel.title: Video on Poco A Poco | Web Design and Development
channel.description: Recent content in Video on Poco A Poco | Web Design and Development

item.title: Kickstarter Videos for Artana Games
item.description: Powering Up! is an expansion to the hit board game Tesla vs. Edison. Funded over 3000%, Powering Up! raised 3/4ths the money of its base game, Tesla vs. Edison.

item.title: Case Study Video for Involution Studios
item.description: DataXu had a unique vision to be a leader in the big data game. Thanks to the Involution Studios redesign that data now gives their clients many recommendations and methods to forecast, in real time, anytime.

item.title: Book Trailers
item.description: Authors Jon Follett and Matthew Holm contacted me to create a trailer for their latest book. The project time frame was short–the book release was only two weeks away.

item.title: Documentary for The Ohio Center for Extra-scientific Research
item.description: The Ohio Center for Extrascientific Research or The OCER is a fictional organization inspired by reality TV shows like Ghosthunters and River Monsters and alternative media like Coast to Coast AM and Infowars.

item.title: Music Video for Fine Animal
item.description: Observe Arts was a video production project started by myself and designer Owen Carstensen. Observe created projections for Columbus-based band Fine Animalâ€™s album release show and documented their performance.

item.title: TotalGrow Product Video for Venntis Technologies
item.description: TotalGrow lighting uses a new LED technology which only emits light at the wavelengths most advantageous for plant growth.
